content:
NodeDeactivationTaskType NodeDeactivationTaskType Enum

In this Article

Edit

Specifies the different types of node deactivation tasks.

Syntax

Declaration

public enum NodeDeactivationTaskTypePublic Enum NodeDeactivationTaskType

Fields

Client
Client

Specifies that the task was created by calling the public API.
Infrastructure
Infrastructure

Specifies the task created by the Azure MR.
Invalid
Invalid

Invalid task type.
Repair
Repair

Specifies the task that was created by the Repair Manager service.

Details

Namespace

System.Fabric

Assembly

System.Fabric.dll
